title: "Introducing Cross-tenant Power BI Dataset Sharing"
excerpt: "Our new cross-tenant dataset sharing capability is now available in public preview! This exciting capability allows customers to share their Power BI datasets with external users (consumers) in a way that allows these external users to access the datasets in their own Power BI tenant. "
